item.text: Now Jericho was shut tightly because of the Israelites. No one was allowed to leave or enter.
The Lord told Joshua, “See, I am about to defeat Jericho for you, along with its king and its warriors.

Have <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0376 04421">warriors</st> <st data-num="05437 05892 05362">march around</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="06471" class="">time</st>;<n id="1" /> <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> <st data-num="03541" class="">this</st> for <st data-num="08337" class="">six</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st>.

Have <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="03548" class="">priests</st> <st data-num="05375" class="">carry</st> <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="03104" class="">rams’</st> <st data-num="07782" class="">horns</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="06440" class="">in front of</st> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st>. On the <st data-num="07637" class="">seventh</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> <st data-num="05437" class="">march around</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="06471" class="">times</st>, while the <st data-num="03548" class="">priests</st> <st data-num="08628" class="">blow</st> the <st data-num="07782" class="">horns</st>.
When you hear the signal from the rams’ horns, have the whole army give a loud battle cry. Then the city wall will collapse, and the warriors should charge straight ahead.”
So Joshua son of Nun summoned the priests and instructed them, “Pick up the ark of the covenant, and seven priests must carry seven rams’ horns in front of the ark of the Lord.”
And he told the army, “Move ahead and march around the city, with armed troops going ahead of the ark of the Lord.”
When Joshua gave the army its orders, the seven priests carrying the seven rams’ horns before the Lord moved ahead and blew the horns as the ark of the covenant of the Lord followed behind.

<st data-num="02502" class="">Armed troops</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">marched</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">ahead</st> of the <st data-num="03548" class="">priests</st> <st data-num="08628" class="">blowing</st> the <st data-num="07782" class="">horns</st>, while the <st data-num="0622" class="">rear guard</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">followed</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">along</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">behind</st> the <st data-num="0727" class="">ark</st> <st data-num="08628" class="">blowing</st> <st data-num="07782" class="">rams’ horns</st>.

Now <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> had <st data-num="06680 0559">instructed</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">army</st>,<n id="1" /> “Do <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07321" class="">give a battle cry</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">raise</st> your <st data-num="06963" class="">voices</st>; <st data-num="03318 06310 01697">say</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">nothing</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> I <st data-num="0559 0413">tell</st> you, ‘<st data-num="07321" class="">Give the battle cry</st>.’<n id="4" /> Then <st data-num="07321" class="">give the battle cry</st>!”<n id="5" />
So Joshua made sure they marched the ark of the Lord around the city one time. Then they went back to the camp and spent the night there.
Bright and early the next morning Joshua had the priests pick up the ark of the Lord.

The seven priests carrying the seven rams’ horns before the ark of the Lord marched along blowing their horns. Armed troops marched ahead of them, while the rear guard followed along behind the ark of the Lord blowing rams’ horns.
They marched around the city one time on the second day, then returned to the camp. They did this six days in all.
On the seventh day they were up at the crack of dawn and marched around the city as before—only this time they marched around it seven times.
The seventh time around, the priests blew the rams’ horns, and Joshua told the army, “Give the battle cry, for the Lord is handing the city over to you!
The city and all that is in it must be set apart for the Lord; only Rahab the prostitute and all who are with her in her house will live, because she hid the spies we sent.

<st data-num="07535" class="">But</st> <st data-num="0859 08104">be careful</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">when</st> you are <st data-num="02763" class="">setting apart</st> the <st data-num="02764" class="">riches for God</st>. <st data-num="06435" class="">If</st> you <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">any of</st> <st data-num="02764" class="">it</st>, then you will <st data-num="07760" class="">make</st> the <st data-num="03478" class="">Israelite</st> <st data-num="04264" class="">camp</st> subject to <st data-num="02764" class="">annihilation</st> and <st data-num="05916" class="">cause</st> a <st data-num="05916" class="">disaster</st>.<n id="1" />
All the silver and gold, as well as bronze and iron items, belong to the Lord. They must go into the Lord’s treasury.”
The rams’ horns sounded, and when the army heard the signal, they gave a loud battle cry. The wall collapsed, and the warriors charged straight ahead into the city and captured it.

They <st data-num="02763" class="">annihilated</st> <st data-num="06310" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">everything</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> breathed in the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>,<n id="1" /> including <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">and</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">women</st>, <st data-num="05288" class="">young</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">and</st> <st data-num="02205" class="">old</st>, <st data-num="05704" class="">as well as</st> <st data-num="07794" class="">cattle</st>, <st data-num="07716" class="">sheep</st>, and <st data-num="02543" class="">donkeys</st>.

<st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">told</st> the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st> who had <st data-num="07270" class="">spied on</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>, “<st data-num="0935" class="">Enter</st> the <st data-num="0802 02181">prostitute’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03318 08033">bring out</st> the <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> belong to her <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> you <st data-num="07650" class="">promised</st> her.”<n id="2" />

So the <st data-num="05288" class="">young</st> <st data-num="07270" class="">spies</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">went</st> and <st data-num="03318" class="">brought out</st> <st data-num="07343" class="">Rahab</st>, her <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>, <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st>, <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> belonged to her. They <st data-num="03318" class="">brought out</st> her <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> and <st data-num="03240" class="">took</st> them <st data-num="03240" class="">to a place</st> <st data-num="02351" class="">outside</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="03478" class="">Israelite</st> <st data-num="04264" class="">camp</st>.
But they burned the city and all that was in it, except for the silver, gold, and bronze and iron items they put in the treasury of the Lord’s house.

Yet <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="02421" class="">spared</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07343" class="">Rahab</st> the <st data-num="02181" class="">prostitute</st>, her <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">family</st>,<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> belonged to her. She <st data-num="03427" class="">lives</st> <st data-num="07130" class="">in</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> very <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> she <st data-num="02244" class="">hid</st> the <st data-num="04397 0834">messengers</st> <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> to <st data-num="07270" class="">spy on</st> <st data-num="03405" class="">Jericho</st>.<n id="4" />

At that time Joshua made this solemn declaration: “The man who attempts to rebuild this city of Jericho will stand condemned before the Lord. He will lose his firstborn son when he lays its foundations and his youngest son when he erects its gates!”
The Lord was with Joshua, and he became famous throughout the land.
